SEARCH
Package com.blackjack.controller

Class GameController

java.lang.Object
com.blackjack.controller.GameController
public class GameController extends Object
This class is responsible for controlling the flow of the Blackjack game, handling user registration, login, game actions, and database interactions.

      Constructor to initialize the GameController.

      dbManager - MongoDB manager instance for database operations
      mainView - Main view of the application

  • Method Details

    • showRegisterView

      public void showRegisterView()
      Displays the register view to allow a user to register.

    • registerUser

      public boolean registerUser(String username, String password)
      Registers a new user in the database.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to register
      password - The password for the user
      Returns:
      True if registration was successful, false otherwise

    • loginAction

      public void loginAction(MainView mainView)
      Handles the login action and displays the login view.
      Parameters:
      mainView - The main view instance

    • loginUser

      public boolean loginUser(String username, String password)
      Authenticates the user with the provided username and password.
      Parameters:
      username - The username to authenticate
      password - The password to authenticate
      Returns:
      True if login is successful, false otherwise

    • logoutAction

      public void logoutAction(MainView mainView)
      Handles the logout action and updates the main view.
      Parameters:
      mainView - The main view instance

    • isUserLoggedIn

      public boolean isUserLoggedIn()
      Checks if the user is logged in.
      Returns:
      True if the user is logged in, false otherwise

    • handleLoadCards

      public void handleLoadCards(String cardLan)
      Loads the cards from the database based on the selected card language (ES/FR).
      Parameters:
      cardLan - The language of the card collection (either "ES" or "FR")

    • onStartButtonPressed

      public void onStartButtonPressed()
      Starts the game by handling player and dealer turns.

    • updateScore

      public void updateScore()
      Updates the score for both the player and the dealer.

    • drawCardForPlayer

      public void drawCardForPlayer()
      Draws a random card for the player and updates the score. If the player exceeds 21 points, the game ends and the winner is determined.

    • onStandButtonPress

      public void onStandButtonPress()
      Handles the event when the "Stand" button is pressed. The player chooses to stand, and the game proceeds to the crupier's turn if necessary.

    • getUserPoints

      public int getUserPoints()
      Returns the total points of the player.
      Returns:
      The total points of the player.

    • setMainView

      public void setMainView(MainView mainView)
      Sets the main view for the game.
      Parameters:
      mainView - The main view to be set.

    • showHallOfFame

      public void showHallOfFame()
      Displays the "Hall of Fame" with the top scores from the database.
